This node configures a Houdini RBD Procedural primitive, which provides a render-time rbd solution that saves disk-space and minimizes the impact on the stage when fractured primitives needing to be transformed result in large numbers of unique pieces. 
A RBD procedural has primvars and relationships to describe the parameters and inputs to the rbd deformer. The rendering process uses those properties on the procedural primitive to deform existing mesh primitives. This workflow is roughly the Karma/Solaris equivalent to using a Transform Pieces SOP on a single geometry object representing multiple individual pieces.
